Functions

helper function creating a properties dict for secondary features (e.g. loads of a bus) to be included in the properties

maptool.network_editor.generateEditableNetwork.extractPropertiesFromNet(input)

helper function creating a properties dict for secondary features (e.g. loads of a bus) to be included in the properties of the final feature geoJSON

Parameters:

input (dict) – contains all secondary features of a type for a single primary feature

Returns:

json containing key value pairs of secondary feature properties and their values for every primary feature

Return type:

dict

maptool.network_editor.generateEditableNetwork.createFeatures(isLines, ppdata, featureName, featureProperties, propertyGroupNames, propertyGroupFeatures)

creates and returns a geoJSON object for a feature of the original pandapower network

Parameters:

  • isLines (bool) – flag for if the geojson object to create is going to be a line or point object

  • ppdata (dict) – the pandapower network object

  • featureName (string) – determines how we handle feature extraction and geojson creation

  • featureProperties (list[string]) – contains the names of all properties for a feature (e.g. bus, line etc)

  • propertyGroupNames (list[string]) – only relevant for bus features; contains names of all secondary features we want to add (switch, sgen, load)

  • propertyGroupFeatures (list[list[string]]) – only relevant for bus features; contains the names of all properties for a secondary feature

Returns:

geoJSON dict containing all features of a single type (bus, line etc) of a network

Return type:

dict

maptool.network_editor.generateEditableNetwork.extractStdTypes(ppdata)

std_types are already saved in a convenient datastructure in the pandapower network, so we just extract them as is

Returns:

json string of all std_types grouped by feature (line, trafo)

Return type:

string

maptool.network_editor.generateEditableNetwork.createGeoJSONofNetwork(net, bus, trafo, line, ext_grid, std_types)

creates the final json object that contains geoJSON objects for every feature type we want to display on the GUI map

Parameters:

  • net (dict) – the pandapower network

  • bus (bool) – flag determining whether we want to include buses in the displayable network

  • trafo (bool) – flag determining whether we want to include trafos in the displayable network

  • line (bool) – flag determining whether we want to include lines in the displayable network

  • ext_grid (bool) – flag determining whether we want to include ext_grids in the displayable network

  • std_types (bool) – flag determining whether we want to include std_types in the frontend editor

Returns:

json object containing geojsons for every feature of the original pdp net we want to display

Return type:

dict
